title: Religions
alt: But to us there is but one God, plus or minus one. —1 Corinthians 8:6±2.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan talking.]
Megan: So are you worried about the rapture?
Cueball: No, unless it figures out how to open doors.
Megan: I said rapture.Cueball: Oh, I'm not really into that. I'm the kind of christian who only goes to church on Christmas and Easter, and then spends the other 363 days at the mosque.
Megan: ...I don't think that's a thing.
Cueball: Our rabbi swears it's legit.Cueball: What religion are you?
Megan: Experimentalist Monotheism.
Cueball: Which is?
Megan: We believe there's one god, but we're trying to find the error bars on that number.
